plot: Angelo is an intelligent but frustrated Journalism student in love with a beautiful but indifferent classmate, but everything can be changed: he must take control of his own story.
title: A História de Ângelo
plot_es: Angelo is an intelligent but frustrated Journalism student in love with a beautiful but indifferent classmate, but everything can be changed: he must take control of his own story.
plot_en: Angelo is an intelligent but frustrated Journalism student in love with a beautiful but indifferent classmate, but everything can be changed: he must take control of his own story.
